emotions: Accept aggression, you can contain yourself by expressing yourself.
fear: Not being able to influence, not reaching the established level.
influence_others_by: Establishing a pace to follow to develop innovative systems and approaches.
judge_others_by: Their own standards, progressive ideas in carrying out the work.
more_effective_if: Be kinder, use more tact when communicating, cooperate more with the team, recognize that there are penalties.

People with a Creative Pattern show two opposing forces in their behavior. The desire for tangible results is counterbalanced by an equal drive for perfection. His aggressiveness is tempered by his sensitivity. Quick thinking and reaction time are slowed by the desire to explore all possible solutions before making a decision.

Creative people extraordinarily foresee the approach to a project and make the necessary changes. Because people with a Creative Pattern are perfectionists and have a great ability to plan, the changes they make are often appropriate, even if interpersonal relationships may be lacking in attention.

The creative person wants freedom to explore and the authority to examine and verify results. You can make daily decisions quickly, but you can be extremely cautious when making decisions of real importance. "Should I accept this promotion?", "Should I move somewhere else?" Because of his need for results and perfection, the creative person does not care much about social forms. It can seem cold, foreign and abrupt.
under_pressure: He is easily bored with routine work, when he is restrained he becomes moody, he is independent.
